¬A16.natural: It is not the case that the theory is accepted by the community.

¬A18.natural: It is not the case that the grant was awarded by the funding body.

¬A19.natural: It is not the case that the project was terminated by the sponsor.

¬A24.natural: It is not the case that the work was ignored by the community.
